Package classes

Class GameComponent

java.lang.Object
classes.GameComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barrier, Bonus, Enemy, Exit, Player, Punishment, Reward
public class GameComponent extends Object
This class is used to get the position of boundary. The boundaries will check whether the objects collide during the game.
